name: Muhammad Maula Fikry - D3-Electronic Engineering
description: As a professional maintainer and expert in PCB design, PLC programming, and 3D design, I have a strong background in electronics and mechatronics engineering, which allows me to develop creative and efficient solutions for a variety of projects. I also have a basis in business knowledge, which I also apply to my competencies. I have also gained in-depth knowledge and have worked in a variety of industries, demonstrating my ability to overcome technical challenges effectively.
